manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Don't let its size fool you. Big things do indeed come from small packages. More important than the power you will receive from our batteries is the ease of mind you experience in knowing that our batteries are the most reliable in the business. External Durabliltiy Internal Qualilty Complete Reliability ExpertPower EXP1250 12 volt 5 Ah Rechargeable SLA Battery The EXP1250 is a standard sized 12 volt battery commonly used in home alarm systems. The small size makes it convenient for many popular applications such as the portable speakers and Uninterruptible-Power-Systems. Its external casing is made with a hardened ABS plastic to protect against spills and leaks. The battery utilizes Absorbent Glass Mat Technology which is capable of delivering high currents on demand and offers a relatively long service life. 12 Volt 5 Ah / 20 Hr SLA Battery Maintenance Free Long Shelf Life High Discharge Rate Long Service Life 2.8" x 3.5" x 3.9" (LxWxH)

From our Factory to your Front Door Step 1 - Assemble and Charge Ever wonder how a battery is made? Me neither, but it's actually quite interesting. The first component of the battery is the ABS plastic shell. We then insert our very own lead plates and glass mat separators into the shell before filling with acid. The batteries are then capped, sealed, and charged to complete the process. Step 2 - Assess for Quality The next step in the process is that of quality control. We don't make great products by accident. Our inventory is carefully controlled by strict quality assessments that must be met before qualifying for shipment. Our products undergo voltage tests, weight measurement, and psychology tests to make sure they are physically and mentally sound. Step 3 - Pack with Care We've all gotten that package delivered in the mail that was clearly marked as 'fragile' but looked like it was used as a football by the delivery man. That's why all of our items are packaged with the customer in mind Step 4 - Deliver On Time, Every Time Your order is not completed until the item is in your hands. After all, what good is a great product if it doesn't get to you in time? When your alarm is screeching 'Fix Me, Fix Me!', you can trust that you won't have to wait an eternity for your battery to arrive.

The Expert Staff - Saving the world one battery at a time The Experts are a group of multi-talented battery specialists who spent way too much time indoors while growing up. They're real people who genuinely care about providing you with the best service possible. With Great Power Comes Great Rechargeability Established in 1987, we've been in the battery business for over 20 years. Our product reviews are from actual customers who both appreciate and trust the quality they have come to expect from our products. We're not the bragging type, but we're more than happy to let our customers speak for us. Feeling Powerless? Are you trying to power your alarm or power your boat? Doesn't matter, because we're here to power your life. With our wide variety of products, you can always be sure that we have the item you need. Want to talk about it? If you have a question, comment, complaint about any of our products or services, please send us a message, and we'll get back to you within one business day. Our Staff Our Specialty Our Selection Our Service

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars ExpertPower EXP1250: A Reliable Watchdog for My Home Alarm
reviews.reviewText: Pros:Peace of mind: Knowing my alarm has a fresh, reliable battery powering it gives me immense peace of mind. I haven't experienced a single false alarm or power outage issue since switching to the EXP1250.Long-lasting: This battery boasts a 500-cycle lifespan at 50% depth discharge, which translates to years of worry-free protection. I haven't had to replace it yet, and based on current performance, I don't expect to for quite some time.Compact and compatible: The EXP1250 is a compact 12V battery that fit perfectly into my alarm system's designated space. Plus, the F1 terminals ensured hassle-free installation – no need for adapters or modifications.Durable and leakproof: The hardened ABS plastic casing feels sturdy and gives me confidence that the battery can handle accidental bumps or spills. Plus, the sealed lead acid technology eliminates the risk of leaks or corrosion.Great value: Compared to other brands, the EXP1250 offers excellent value for its price. Considering its performance and lifespan, it's a budget-friendly investment in your home security.Cons:Weight: While not a dealbreaker, the EXP1250 is a bit on the heavy side compared to some other 5Ah batteries. This might be a consideration if you need to move or handle the battery frequently.Overall:I highly recommend the ExpertPower EXP1250 to anyone looking for a reliable and long-lasting battery for their home alarm system. It's given me peace of mind knowing my security system is always powered and ready to protect my home. The exceptional performance, durability, and affordability make it a top choice in my book.

This saved me a $70 service call for the alarm company to tell me I need to replace the battery and they would charge much more than this battery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Replacement for My Craftsman Garage Door Opener
reviews.reviewText: I needed a new battery for my Craftsman garage door opener. I received an alert that the battery was no longer charging. This battery serves as a power backup for the garage door opener. In the event of a power failure this battery will allow the opener to continue to function normally. I bought my garage door opener specifically because it had a battery backup so if the battery needed replacement then I will replace it.Since Craftsman is now owned by Lowe's I went to my local Lowe's store in search of a replacement battery. I was shocked by the price. Let's just say the retail price was about 30% of what a new garage door opener would cost. There had to be a cheaper alternative. I went home and did a search on Amazon and found EXP1250 12V 5Ah Home Alarm Battery. The price was less than $20 which seemed very reasonable to me. The description said it would fit my Craftsman garage door opener so I placed my order. This battery was a perfect fit.It took me less than two minutes to install this battery. It's as easy as unplugging the positive and neutral terminal plugs from the old battery and plugging them onto the new battery. Another few seconds to put the battery in the garage door opener and my battery backup was back online.I have had this battery installed for several months now without any issues. We had a power outage about a month ago and I took the opportunity to see if my garage door opener was still functional. The door opened and closed flawlessly. The lights and control switch were fully functional. Perfect!I am very pleased with my purchase of the EXP1250 12V 5Ah Home Alarm Battery. It is a perfect replacement for my Craftsman garage door opener. Five stars. If this review is helpful for you please click the "Helpful" button below.

Nous avons un gros haut-parleur portatif qui a coûté cher. Ça fait déjà 6 ans que nous l'avons et évidemment, la batterie a terminé sa vie. Au lieu de racheter un autre haut-parleur, simplement changer la batterie et nous sommes bons pour encore 5-6 ans! Yes!
